title: Keep Singin’ On
lyrics:
Verse 1:
Came to this town with a song in my heart,
Voice full of dreams, but the world’s played hard.
Waitin’ on tables, sweepin’ floors till dawn,
Holdin’ to hope when the money’s all gone.
Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.
Verse 2:
Mama’s voice echoes, said I’d shine someday,
But she’s gone to glory, and I’m still findin’ my way.
This old guitar’s my only friend some nights,
Singin’ to shadows, chasin’ stage lights.
Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.
Bridge:
Bills stack high, and the dreams wear thin,
But my soul’s got a fire that won’t give in.
Every scar’s a story, every tear’s a call,
I’ll sing through the silence till I’ve given it all.
Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.
Outro:
So here’s my voice, let it carry me home,
Through empty rooms where my dreams still roam.
No matter how heavy, I’ll carry this dawn,
With love in my heart, I keep singin’ on.
rawContent:
## 80. Keep Singin’ On

**Created:** 6/1/2025
**Updated:** 6/1/2025

### Lyrics

Verse 1:
Came to this town with a song in my heart,
Voice full of dreams, but the world’s played hard.
Waitin’ on tables, sweepin’ floors till dawn,
Holdin’ to hope when the money’s all gone.

Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.

Verse 2:
Mama’s voice echoes, said I’d shine someday,
But she’s gone to glory, and I’m still findin’ my way.
This old guitar’s my only friend some nights,
Singin’ to shadows, chasin’ stage lights.

Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.

Bridge:
Bills stack high, and the dreams wear thin,
But my soul’s got a fire that won’t give in.
Every scar’s a story, every tear’s a call,
I’ll sing through the silence till I’ve given it all.

Chorus:
Keep singin’ on, let the truth ring true,
Every note’s a fight for the life I pursue.
Through the ache and the doubt, I’ll still raise my song,
Heart’s still burnin’, so I keep singin’ on.

Outro:
So here’s my voice, let it carry me home,
Through empty rooms where my dreams still roam.
No matter how heavy, I’ll carry this dawn,
With love in my heart, I keep singin’ on.

### Notes

For singer called Maria

### Sounds Like

Acoustic: Alex plays on his rusted guitar, the slightly sharp strings ringing with open chords (G, C, D, Am). His gravelly vocals carry a warm, steady cadence, rising in the chorus with a hopeful lift, the song’s intimacy suiting a garage jam for Maria.
Full Studio: A clean acoustic guitar leads, backed by a gentle kick drum, upright bass, and subtle fiddle fills. Maria’s vocals (imagined as rich and soulful) soar with reverb, harmonies in the chorus, and a mandolin adding sparkle, creating a polished yet rootsy country track.
